dialogs.confirmDeleteNamed: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load users. Please try refreshing.
errors.loadApiKeyFailed: Failed to load API key info
errors.reasonRequired: Please provide a reason for disabling this user

createUser.title: Create New User
createUser.roleHelperText: Select user's role in the system

disableUser.title: Disable User Account
disableUser.description: Please provide a reason for disabling this user account. This will be logged for audit purposes.
disableUser.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., Account compromise, Terms violation, User request, etc.

deleteUser.title: Delete User Account
deleteUser.warning: This action cannot be undone. The user will be permanently removed from the system.
deleteUser.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the user {{username}}?
deleteUser.dataNote: All associated data will be preserved, but the user will no longer be able to log in.

disableMfa.title: Disable MFA
disableMfa.confirmation: Are you sure you want to disable MFA for this user? They will need to set it up again if required.

terminateSession.title: Terminate Session?
terminateSession.description: This will log the user out from this device. The user will need to log in again to continue using the application.

terminateAllSessions.title: Terminate All Sessions?
terminateAllSessions.description: This will log the user out from ALL devices, including their current session. The user will need to log in again. This action cannot be undone.
terminateAllSessions.warning: This includes any active work sessions!

revokeApiKey.title: Revoke User API Key?
revokeApiKey.warning: This will immediately disable API access for this user. Any applications using this key will stop working.
revokeApiKey.confirmation: Are you sure you want to revoke this user's API key?

detail.title: User Details
detail.apiKeySecurityNote: Admins can revoke API keys but cannot view the plaintext key for security reasons.
detail.sharePasswordSecurely: Please share this password securely with the user.

form.dataRetentionHelperText: Leave empty to use system default. Enter 0 to keep forever.
form.excludeFromPotfile: Exclude from potfile (don't save cracked passwords)
form.excludeFromPotfileHelperText: Enable this for clients with strict data retention requirements

validation.retentionInvalid: Retention Period must be a non-negative number or empty (for default).

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load clients. Please try refreshing.
errors.loadDefaultSettingsFailed: Failed to load default client settings.

deleteClient.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteClient.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the client "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone. Associated hashlists may be deleted immediately or orphaned based on retention policies.

wordlists.uploadToGetStarted: Upload a wordlist to get started

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

upload.fileUploadDescription: Select a wordlist file to upload. Supported formats: .txt, .dict, .dic, .lst, .wordlist, .wl, .gz, .zip

delete.cascadeWarning: Deleting wordlist "{{name}}" will also delete the following:

rules.description: Manage Hashcat rules for password cracking
rules.uploadToGetStarted: Upload a rule to get started

errors.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

upload.fileUploadDescription: Select a rule file to upload. Supported formats: .rule, .rules, .txt

delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete rule "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
delete.cascadeWarning: Deleting rule "{{name}}" will also delete the following:

presetJobs.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this preset job?
presetJobs.noJobsFound: No preset jobs found. Create one to get started.
presetJobs.calculatingAllKeyspacesMessage: Calculating keyspaces for all preset jobs. This may take a moment...

fields.allowHighPriorityOverride: Allow High Priority Override (can interrupt running jobs)

helperText.binaryVersion: Select the hashcat binary version to use
helperText.incrementMode: Use increment mode to try masks of varying lengths
helperText.chunkSize: Duration for each work chunk in seconds
helperText.allowHighPriorityOverride: When enabled, this job can interrupt lower priority running jobs to take their agents
helperText.wordlistsNotUsed: Wordlists not used for this attack mode
helperText.rulesNotUsed: Rules not used for this attack mode
helperText.selectRule: Optionally select a rule file to apply transformations
helperText.firstWordlist: Words from this list will be used as the first part
helperText.secondWordlist: Words from this list will be appended to the first

errors.straightModeWordlist: Straight attack mode requires exactly 1 wordlist
errors.combinationModeWordlists: Combination attack mode requires exactly 2 wordlists
errors.selectBothWordlists: Please select both wordlists for combination mode
errors.bruteForceModeMask: Brute force attack mode requires a mask
errors.hybridModeWordlist: Hybrid attack mode requires exactly 1 wordlist
errors.hybridModeMask: Hybrid attack mode requires a mask
errors.associationModeNotImplemented: Association attack mode is not implemented
errors.noWordlistsAvailable: No wordlists available. Please upload wordlists first.

workflows.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the workflow "{{name}}"?
workflows.noWorkflowsFound: No workflows found. Create one to get started.

form.noJobsAdded: No jobs added to this workflow yet. Search and add preset jobs above.

helperText.searchPresetJobs: Search for preset jobs to add to this workflow

errors.presetJobRequired: At least one preset job is required
errors.noPresetJobsAvailable: No preset jobs available. Create preset jobs first.

messages.cannotDeleteLast: Cannot delete the last active {{type}} binary
messages.cannotDeleteOnly: Cannot delete the only binary of this type

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Delete
deleteDialog.message: Are you sure you want to delete the binary "{{fileName}}"? This action cannot be undone.

diagnostics.diagnosticPackageDescription: Download a diagnostic package containing system information, logs, and configuration details for troubleshooting.
diagnostics.hoursTooltip: Number of hours of logs to include
diagnostics.serverDebugDescription: Enable verbose logging for the server. This will increase log file sizes and may impact performance.
diagnostics.serverLogsDescription: Manage server log files. Purging logs is permanent and cannot be undone.
diagnostics.noAgentsWithDebugStatus: No agents with debug status available
diagnostics.postgresLogsWarning: PostgreSQL logs may contain sensitive data. Consider purging them after troubleshooting.
diagnostics.nginxLogsWarning: Nginx access logs may contain sensitive request data. Consider purging them after troubleshooting.
diagnostics.sensitiveNginxLogsWarning: Nginx access logs may contain sensitive information including authentication tokens in request headers and query parameters.
diagnostics.sensitivePostgresLogsWarning: PostgreSQL logs may contain sensitive information including queries with user data, passwords, and connection details.
diagnostics.sensitiveLogsTestEnvironmentWarning: Only include these logs for test/development environments or when absolutely necessary for debugging.
diagnostics.sensitiveLogsProductionWarning: Do not include sensitive logs in production diagnostics packages shared externally.
diagnostics.confirmPurgeLogs: Are you sure you want to purge {{dirLabel}}?
diagnostics.confirmPurgeAgentLogs: Are you sure you want to purge logs for agent {{agentId}}?
diagnostics.serverDebugModeMessage: This will change the server's logging level. The nginx server will be reloaded to apply changes.
diagnostics.serverDebugModeWarning: The page will briefly reconnect after applying changes.
diagnostics.pleaseWaitReconnecting: Please wait while the server restarts...
diagnostics.nginxLogsTooltip: Warning: May contain sensitive request data
diagnostics.postgresLogsTooltip: Warning: May contain sensitive database queries

messages.reconnectionTimedOut: Reconnection timed out. Please refresh the page.
messages.toggleAllAgentsDebugFailed: Failed to toggle debug for all agents:

authSettings.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Click 'Save Settings' to apply them.

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
accountSecurity.notificationAggregationHelper: How long to aggregate similar notifications before sending

mfa.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
mfa.emailCodeValidityHelper: How long email verification codes are valid
mfa.codeExpiryHelper: How long MFA codes are valid
mfa.maxCodeAttemptsHelper: Maximum failed code attempts before lockout
mfa.backupCodesCountHelper: Number of backup codes to generate

webauthn.title: WebAuthn / Passkey Configuration
webauthn.notSupported: WebAuthn is not supported in this browser.
webauthn.requiresDomain: Passkeys require a proper domain and HTTPS. Configure your domain settings below.
webauthn.rpDisplayNameHelper: Name shown to users during passkey registration
webauthn.configured: WebAuthn is configured and ready for use.

session.title: Session Management
session.tokenCleanupIntervalHelper: How often to clean up expired tokens
session.absoluteTimeoutHelper: Force re-authentication after this time (0 = disabled)

errors.emailProviderRequired: Email provider is required for email-based MFA

ssoSettings.pageDescription: Configure Single Sign-On providers and authentication options

authMethods.title: Authentication Methods
authMethods.description: Enable or disable authentication methods globally

provisioning.title: User Provisioning
provisioning.description: Configure automatic user creation from SSO logins
provisioning.autoCreateUsersDescription: Automatically create user accounts for new SSO logins
provisioning.autoEnableUsersDescription: Automatically enable newly created SSO users (otherwise admin approval required)

providers.title: SSO Providers
providers.noProviders: No SSO providers configured. Click "Add Provider" to create one.

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the provider "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will unlink all associated user identities.

ldapConfig.title: LDAP Configuration
ldapConfig.usernameAttributeHelper: LDAP attribute containing username (e.g., sAMAccountName, uid)

samlConfig.title: SAML Configuration
samlConfig.usernameAttributeHelper: SAML attribute containing username (e.g., uid, username)

oauthConfig.title: OAuth/OIDC Configuration
oauthConfig.usernameAttributeHelper: Claim containing username (e.g., preferred_username, login, nickname)

labels.skipTlsVerify: Skip TLS Certificate Verification (insecure, not recommended)

test.title: Test Email Configuration
test.content: Enter an email address to send a test email to:

save.title: Save Configuration
save.content: Would you like to test the configuration after saving?

warnings.tlsVerifyWarning: Disabling TLS verification makes your connection vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks. Only use this for testing with self-signed certificates.

clientSettings.title: Client Settings
clientSettings.retentionHelperText: Default retention period for new clients (0 = keep forever)

errors.invalidRetention: Retention period must be a non-negative number

priority.title: Priority Settings
priority.tooltip: Configure the maximum priority value that can be assigned to jobs and preset jobs. This helps maintain consistent priority ranges across your organization.
priority.helperText: Set the maximum priority value (1-1,000,000). Jobs and preset jobs cannot exceed this priority.

priorityInfo.title: Priority System Information
priorityInfo.description: The priority system uses a range from 0 to your configured maximum priority. Higher numbers indicate higher priority.
priorityInfo.note: You cannot set a maximum priority lower than any existing preset job priorities. Update or remove high-priority preset jobs first if needed.

agentScheduling.title: Agent Scheduling
agentScheduling.tooltip: Enable or disable the agent scheduling system globally. When enabled, agents can have daily schedules configured.
agentScheduling.description: When enabled, agents can be configured with daily schedules. Only agents that are scheduled for the current time will be assigned jobs.
agentScheduling.note: Individual agents must also have scheduling enabled and schedules configured for this to take effect.

agentOverflow.title: Agent Overflow Allocation
agentOverflow.tooltip: Configure how agents beyond max_agents limits are allocated when jobs have the same priority
agentOverflow.fifoDescription: When multiple jobs at the same priority exceed their max_agents limits, the oldest job (created first) receives all extra agents.
agentOverflow.roundRobinDescription: Extra agents are distributed evenly across all jobs at the same priority, one agent at a time, ensuring fair allocation.

hashlist.title: Hashlist Settings
hashlist.tooltip: Configure settings related to hashlist uploads and management
hashlist.requireClientDescription: When enabled, users must assign a client when uploading new hashlists. This helps maintain better organization and tracking of hashlists by client.
hashlist.batchSizeHelper: Number of hashes processed per batch during uploads. Default: 100,000. Recommended: 500,000-1,000,000 for large hashlists (47M+)
hashlist.performance500k: 500K: Better for large hashlists, may improve throughput
hashlist.performance1m: 1M: Best for very large hashlists (50M+), requires more RAM

potfile.title: Potfile Settings
potfile.tooltip: Configure how the potfile processes cracked passwords for reuse across jobs
potfile.maxBatchSizeHelper: Number of staged passwords to process in each batch cycle (1,000 - 500,000)
potfile.batchIntervalHelper: Seconds between pot-file batch processing cycles (10 - 600)
potfile.description: The potfile collects cracked passwords from all jobs and reuses them in subsequent attacks. Higher batch sizes process more passwords at once but take longer per cycle.

errors.maxPriorityPositive: Maximum priority must be a positive number
errors.batchSizeRange: Batch size must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
errors.intervalRange: Interval must be between {{min}} and {{max}} seconds

messages.overflowFailed: Failed to update overflow allocation mode

jobExecution.title: Job Execution Settings
jobExecution.description: Configure how jobs are executed and distributed across agents

agentConfig.title: Agent Configuration
agentConfig.maxConcurrentJobsHelper: Maximum jobs an agent can run simultaneously
agentConfig.benchmarkCacheHelper: How long to cache agent benchmarks
agentConfig.speedtestTimeoutHelper: Maximum time to wait for speedtest completion
agentConfig.reconnectGraceHelper: Time to wait for agents to reconnect after server restart

jobControl.title: Job Control
jobControl.allowInterruptionHelper: Higher priority jobs can interrupt running jobs
jobControl.realtimeNotificationsHelper: Send notifications when hashes are cracked
jobControl.refreshIntervalHelper: How often to refresh job status in UI
jobControl.maxRetryAttemptsHelper: Number of times to retry failed chunks
jobControl.jobsPerPageHelper: Default pagination size for job lists

potfile.title: Potfile Settings
potfile.enablePotfileHelper: Automatically store cracked passwords for use in future jobs. Individual hashlists can still be excluded.

ruleSplitting.title: Rule Splitting
ruleSplitting.enableRuleSplittingHelper: Automatically split large rule files for distributed processing
ruleSplitting.thresholdHelper: Split when job time exceeds chunk time by this factor
ruleSplitting.minRulesHelper: Don't split files with fewer rules
ruleSplitting.maxChunksHelper: Maximum chunks to create per file

messages.loadFailed: Failed to load job execution settings

metricsRetention.title: Metrics Retention Periods
metricsRetention.description: Configure how long to retain metrics at different levels of detail. Data cascades from fine-grained to aggregated over time.
metricsRetention.realtimeDataHelper: Days to keep fine-grained metrics for recent activity (e.g., 7 days)
metricsRetention.dailyAggregatesHelper: Days to store daily summaries after real-time period (e.g., 30 days)
metricsRetention.weeklyAggregatesHelper: Days to preserve long-term trends as weekly summaries (e.g., 365 days)

aggregation.title: Aggregation Settings
aggregation.enableAggregationDescription: Automatically consolidate older metrics to save storage space while preserving trends
aggregation.intervalHelper: How often to run the aggregation process

cascading.title: How cascading aggregation works:
cascading.realtime: Real-time data provides detailed metrics for recent activity
cascading.daily: After the real-time period, data is aggregated to daily summaries
cascading.weekly: After the daily period, data is further aggregated to weekly summaries
cascading.benefit: This approach keeps charts readable while preserving historical trends

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load settings. Please try again.
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

agentDownloads.title: Agent File Transfer Settings
agentDownloads.description: Configure how agents download files from the backend. These settings apply to all connected agents.

concurrentDownloads.title: Concurrent Downloads
concurrentDownloads.description: Maximum number of files that can be downloaded simultaneously

downloadTimeout.title: Download Timeout
downloadTimeout.description: Maximum time allowed for a single file download

retryAttempts.title: Retry Attempts
retryAttempts.description: Number of times to retry failed downloads

progressInterval.title: Progress Report Interval
progressInterval.description: How often agents report download progress

chunkSize.title: Chunk Size
chunkSize.description: Download chunk size for future resume capability

agentDownloads.applyNote: Changes will apply to agents on their next connection. Currently connected agents will receive updates automatically.

errors.loadFailed: Failed to load agent download settings
errors.saveFailed: Failed to update agent download settings

hashTypes.title: Hash Type Management
hashTypes.description: Manage supported hash types for password cracking operations

dialog.processingInfo: This hash type requires special processing. Processing logic is managed programmatically.

validation.hashIdRequired: Hash ID is required and must be positive

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.warning: This hash type is currently enabled. Deleting it may affect existing functionality.

messages.deleteInUse: Cannot delete: This hash type is in use by existing hashlists
messages.loadFailed: Failed to load hash types. Please try refreshing the page.
